channel.title: Increasing Inventory ammount
channel.description:
I know its possible to do, because a good friend of mine (Java professional) helped me do it.
hes long gone havent talked to him in years :(
anyways, it had something to do with looking in Class30_Sub2_Sub1 or something like that, and finding a thing that said something like
inventory=( 7 x 4 = 28 and chaning those numbers, and then doing somethign server sided.
I know a decent ammount about java and am looking for some help. thanks
